text: Elena Raffalovich Elena Raffalovich (1842-1918), was a Russian educator. A noted figure within the pioneers of the Kindergarten, she was foremost active in Italy. == References == * Duilio Gasparini, Adolfo Pick. Il pensiero e l'opera, 3 voll., Biblioteca Nazionale Pedagogica, Firenze, 1968 Category:1842 births Category:1918 deaths Category:19th-century Russian educators Category:Russian educators
title: Elena Raffalovich
